name: backoff-decorator
description: Exponential retry backoff library offering full jitter and decorators.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm install && npm run compile
scripts.test:ci: npm run compile && mkdir -p shippable/testresults shippable/codecoverage && nyc --reporter cobertura --report-dir shippable/codecoverage mocha -- --opts test/mocha.ci.opts 'dist/test/**/*.js'
scripts.packages:lock:regenerate: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json; npm install --package-lock; npm out; true
scripts.publish-to-npm: npm login && npm version patch && git push --tags origin master && npm publish
